class.name: JarPlanetSdf
class.brief_description: A procedurally generated signed distance field (SDF) planet.
class.description: A signed distance field (SDF) sphere that simulates a planet. Unlike a regular sphere, the planet's surface is procedurally varied using [code]noise[/code], an instance of [FastNoiseLite], which generates terrain-like features such as mountains and valleys.

members.member: The origin point of the planet in 3D space.
The [code]FastNoiseLite[/code] instance used to deform the surface of the planet, creating features like mountains and valleys.
Controls the scale of the noise used for surface deformation. Higher values result in larger terrain features.
The base radius of the planet before applying noise-based deformation.
